String.string: Cultists' Conspiracy
Find Padraig near the Cardovek Remnants.
Kill Lokian sorcerers to recover cryptographs.
Bring the cryptographs to Padraig.
Kill a Lokian berserker in the Cardovek Remnants and recover a Decryption Device.
"No, I lost the Decryption Device."
"Yes, I have the Decryption Device."
Decrypt the messages and return to Padraig.
"Thank you."
Return to Padraig.
"The decryption is taken care of."
Use the Decryption Device on the cryptographs and deliver the decrypted message to Padraig.
Find Tezluar in the Cardovek Remnants and kill him.
Report to Mysterium researcher Padraig at Cardovek Remnants.
"I can help."
Report to Mattin at the Sanctum Mysterium.
It is done. The defense shield is active.
Speak with Mattin and teleport together. Speak with Mattin again and defend him from attack.
"I'll do my best."
Speak with Mattin at the Sanctum Mysterium.
